department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 主要教導學生瞭解二極體之元件特性與應用電路設計技術與雙載子接面電晶體之元件特性、偏壓電路與小訊號放大電路的分析與應用電路設計技術，以提昇學生類比電路之分析與設計能力
goal.en: "Mainly to teach students to understand the characteristics of the components of the diode and the application of circuit design technology and dual carrier junction transistor characteristics, bias circuit and small signal amplification circuit analysis and application of circuit design techniques to enhance the student analog circuit Analysis and design capabilities"

outline.ch: "Week 1: 導論Week 2: 電阻電路Week 3: 電感與電容Week 4: 暫態分析Week 5: 交流弦波輸入之穩態分析 Week 6: 頻率響應Week 7: 波德圖 諧振Week 8: 邏輯電路1Week 9: 邏輯電路2Week 10:微電腦Week 11:電腦化儀表系統Week 12:二極體Week 13:放大器規格Week 14:放大器外部特性Week 15:運算放大器 1Week 16:運算放大器2Week 17:運算放大器3Week 18:主動濾波器"
outline.en: "Week 1: IntroductionWeek 2: Resistance circuitWeek 3: Inductors and CapacitorsWeek 4: Transient AnalysisWeek 5: Steady State Analysis of AC Sine Wave InputWeek 6: Frequency responseWeek 7: Bode diagram resonanceWeek 8: Logic 1Week 9: Logic 2Week 10: MicrocomputerWeekly 11: Computerized Instrument SystemWeek 12: DiodeWeek 13: Amplifier SpecificationsWeek 14: Amplifier External FeaturesWeekly 15: Operational AmplifierWeek 16: Operational AmplifierWeek 17: Operational Amplifier 3Week 18: Active Filter"

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
